net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.api.config

Interface ConfiguredSearchIndexerOptions

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SearchIndexerOptions
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfiguredSearchIndexerOptionsBean

    public interface ConfiguredSearchIndexerOptions
extends SearchIndexerOptions
    This is the interface for the additional options to use for the ConfiguredSearchIndexer.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
    See Also:
    ConfiguredSearchIndexer.index(String, ConfiguredSearchIndexerOptions), ConfiguredSearchIndexerOptionsBean

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getNonUtfEncoding()
      This method gets the non-UTF encoding.
      List<String> getSourceIds()
      This method gets the optional List of source-IDs that shall be (re-)indexed.
      boolean isOptimize()
      This method determines if the search-index will be optimized after indexing.
      boolean isOverwriteEntries()
      This method determines if all existing entries for the sources to index shall be deleted from the search-index and (re-)indexed from scratch.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.api.SearchIndexerOptions

        isOverwriteIndex

    • Method Detail

      • isOptimize

        boolean isOptimize()
        This method determines if the search-index will be optimized after indexing.
        Returns:
        true if the search-index will be optimized, false otherwise.

      • isOverwriteEntries

        boolean isOverwriteEntries()
        This method determines if all existing entries for the sources to index shall be deleted from the search-index and (re-)indexed from scratch. If source-IDs are NOT set (null), this is the same as SearchIndexerOptions.isOverwriteIndex().
        Returns:
        true if existing entries shall be overwritten, false if existing entries shall remain (and will be updated incremental).

      • getSourceIds

        List<String> getSourceIds()
        This method gets the optional List of source-IDs that shall be (re-)indexed. If the List is NOT null (default) all sources will be indexed, otherwise sources configured but NOT contained in this List will NOT be indexed.
        Returns:
        the List of source-IDs or null to index all sources.

      • getNonUtfEncoding

        String getNonUtfEncoding()
        This method gets the non-UTF encoding.
        Returns:
        the non-UTF encoding.
        See Also:
        SearchIndexerConfiguration.getNonUtfEncoding()
